name: Traveler's Rations (1 week)
description: A bundle of dried meats, nuts, and hardtack suitable for a week's travel.

name: Simple Bedroll
description: A coarse wool bedroll, suitable for roadside camps and barn floors.

name: Lantern Oil Flask
description: A small ceramic bottle of thick lantern oil with a cork stopper.

name: Twine and Hooks Set
description: Basic kit for fishing or light repairs. Contains hemp twine and two iron hooks.

name: Sooty Flint and Steel
description: Worn but functional tools for fire starting, stained from long use.

name: Traveler's Rations (1 day)
description: A bundle of dried meat, hardtack, and dried fruit. Keeps well.

name: Common Lantern
description: A simple oil lantern with a protective glass casing.

name: Ink & Quill Set
description: Basic black ink and a goose-feather quill for writing letters and records.

name: Mystic Monkey Paw
description: A shriveled monkey’s paw said to grant twisted wishes—cursed or simply odd?

name: Clockwork Beetle
description: A small mechanical beetle that clicks and whirs when wound up.

name: Bag of Clock Springs
description: A pouch of various-sized metal springs used in precision timepieces.

name: Pouch of Pet Treats
description: Dried meat bites infused with herbs—keeps most small animals happy.

name: Rusty Horseshoe
description: An old but serviceable horseshoe—perfect for repairs or superstitions.

name: Portable Distiller
description: Compact device for purifying water or brewing strong spirits.

name: Salvaged Gear Bundle
description: A random mix of scavenged cogs, rods, and leather straps. Useful or useless?

name: Worn Stuffed Owlbear
description: A well-loved plush owlbear with a missing button eye.

name: Miniature Music Box
description: Plays a haunting lullaby when opened. Small enough to fit in your palm.

name: Bag of Mixed Sundries
description: A grab-bag of random household goods: soap, needles, wax, string.

name: Pickled Kraken Eyeball
description: Floating in cloudy green liquid, this eyeball occasionally twitches.

name: Mummified Sprite Wing
description: Delicately preserved and mounted in a glass vial.

name: Laughing Skull
description: A shrunken skull that emits soft giggles when left alone.

name: Flickering Candle of Doubt
description: Burns with an eerie blue flame and dims when someone lies.

name: Clockwork Spider
description: A small brass spider that crawls in circles when wound.

name: Cursed Deck of Jesters
description: A deck of cards that occasionally deals itself.

name: Unmelting Ice Cube
description: Cold to the touch, it never melts—even in fire.

name: Doll with Human Hair
description: Clearly handmade. The eyes seem to follow you.

name: Everbloom Petal
description: A single petal that never wilts, taken from a sacred grove.

name: Map to Nowhere
description: A map with constantly shifting paths and no clear destination.

name: Inverted Hourglass
description: Sand flows up instead of down. Time passes strangely nearby.

name: Whispering Shell
description: Holding it to your ear reveals secrets not meant for you.

name: Jade Beetle Charm
description: Said to protect against misfortune… or invite it.

name: Stone That Hums at Dusk
description: Glows faintly and emits a hum as the sun sets.

name: Potion of Uncertain Effect
description: Glittering liquid of many colors. Label reads '???'.

name: Brass Pocket Watch
description: A finely engraved pocket watch that ticks with perfect precision.

name: Gear-Forged Mantel Clock
description: An ornate clock with exposed gears, made of dark wood and burnished metal.

name: Wind-Up Timekeeper Golem
description: A tiny automaton shaped like a butler that rings a bell on the hour.

name: Sunstone Hour Dial
description: A flat compass-like tool that tells the hour based on sunlight angle.

name: Tickless Clock
description: Utterly silent and unsettling, yet always accurate.

name: Clock Spring Kit
description: A leather roll containing spare springs, gears, and brass pins.

name: Glass Dome Timer
description: A clear dome filled with falling silver dust. Times exactly one hour.

name: Antique Tower Bell Gear
description: A huge gear salvaged from a collapsed cathedral's clock tower.

name: Wrist Chronometer
description: A sleek leather-banded timepiece with a swiveling faceplate.

name: Clock Tuner’s Toolkit
description: Contains fine tweezers, lubricants, and tiny files.

name: Pendulum Assembly
description: Perfect for grandfather clock restoration, made of polished brass.

name: Moonphase Dial
description: A disk that tracks lunar cycles, carved with silver inlay.

name: Glowtick Lantern Watch
description: A dim watch face lit by a faint magical glow visible in total darkness.

name: Ornamental Gear Pendant
description: Worn more for fashion than function, this gear once belonged to a noble’s timepiece.

name: Hour Bell
description: A small bronze bell designed to chime at hourly intervals when linked to a mechanism.

name: Simple Cooking Pot
description: A battered iron pot, suitable for campfires or hearth cooking.

name: Wool Blanket
description: Warm and thick, ideal for cold nights or long journeys.

name: Clay Mug Set
description: A set of four sturdy mugs, glazed in earth tones.

name: Folding Knife
description: A small, pocket-sized blade for everyday tasks.

name: Bag of Nails
description: A sack containing about 100 iron nails.

name: Pickled Vegetables Jar
description: Preserved root vegetables in a vinegary brine.

name: Coarse Soap Bar
description: A rough-hewn bar made from tallow and lye, strong scent of herbs.

name: Simple Lock & Key
description: A brass padlock with a single key, suitable for basic security.

name: Canvas Satchel
description: A durable side bag with two compartments and a button flap.

name: Chalk Bundle (10 sticks)
description: Soft, colored chalk used for marking walls, maps, or stone.

name: Field Cooking Kit
description: Utensils, small pan, and seasoning tin in a compact leather wrap.

name: Spindle of Thread
description: Linen thread used for basic mending or sewing tasks.

name: Travel-Size Ink Pot
description: A small glass vial sealed with wax, holding black ink.

name: Wooden Spoon Set
description: Four sturdy wooden spoons of various sizes for cooking and eating.

name: Basic Rope (25 ft)
description: Rough hempen rope suitable for climbing or tying loads.

name: Candle of False Flame
description: Burns with light but no heat; wind cannot extinguish it, but clapping can.

name: Compass of True North
description: Always points to true north, unaffected by magic or metal interference.

name: Glass Eye of Insight
description: When worn, grants occasional flashes of insight during puzzles or investigations.

name: Enchanted Music Box
description: Plays a soothing melody that calms agitated creatures nearby.

name: Orb of Phantasms
description: Creates minor illusory images on command, perfect for storytelling or distraction.

name: Clockwork Familiar (bird)
description: A tiny mechanical bird that can scout and relay visual information to its owner as long as the familiar is within 1000 feet of its owner.

name: Tome of Forgotten Lore
description: Contains knowledge lost to time, readable only by those with magical aptitude.

name: Amulet of the Dreaming Mind
description: Allows the wearer to enter and manipulate the dreams of others.

name: Eternal Lantern
description: Emits an everlasting light that wards off undead and spirits.

name: Everclean Backpack
description: A rugged leather pack with multiple compartments for adventurers, enchanted to be impervious to water and dirt.

name: Preserver Pot
description: A durable cast iron pot and lid that maintains the temperature of whatever is placed inside it until the lid is opened.

name: Everdry Cloak
description: A cloak that repels water, keeping the wearer dry even in the heaviest rain.

name: Portable Campfire Kit
description: Includes enchanted flint and tinder that ignite with a simple snap.

name: Healing Salve
description: A balm that accelerates minor wound healing when applied.

name: Extradimensional Bag (small)
description: A magically expanded bag capable of holding far more than its size suggests.

name: Lantern of Revealing
description: Reveals invisible creatures and objects within its light.

name: Pocket Watch
description: A small mechanical watch that keeps accurate time.

name: Repair Kit (Clockwork)
description: Basic tools and oil for maintaining small mechanical devices.

name: Clockwork Bird
description: A small mechanical bird that can mimic sounds and messages.

name: Hourglass of Time Dilation
description: When flipped, briefly slows time for the user, allowing faster reactions.

name: Chrono-Lock
description: A lock that can only be opened at specific times, set by the owner.

name: Clockwork Automaton (Miniature)
description: A small mechanical servant that can perform simple tasks.

name: Eternal Clockwork Heart
description: A powerful magical device that grants the bearer extended life and vigor.

name: Temporal Pocket Watch
description: Allows brief glimpses into the immediate future when consulted.

name: Worn Steel Dagger
description: A small dagger with a chipped blade and a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Enchanted Steel Dagger
description: A finely balanced dagger imbued with a faint enchantment to cut through magical defenses.

name: Blade of Eternal Flame
description: A dagger wreathed in flickering flames that never extinguish.

name: Mythic Phantom Blade
description: A dagger forged in the ethereal plane, capable of striking incorporeal foes with ease.

name: Faded Noble's Ring
description: A silver ring once owned by a minor noble, its insignia barely visible.

name: Ring of Whispered Secrets
description: A silver ring enchanted to allow the wearer to silently communicate with allies.

name: Band of the Eternal Watch
description: A ring that grants its wearer enhanced perception and night vision.

name: Mythic Ring of Dominion
description: A legendary ring said to command loyalty from those around the wearer.

name: Crystal Amulet

name: Amulet of the Shielding Light
description: A glowing amulet that grants a magical shield to the wearer when danger approaches.

name: Amulet of Ethereal Passage
description: An amulet allowing the wearer to briefly step between planes to avoid harm.

name: Common Pigeon
description: A city pigeon, trained for simple message carrying.

name: Miniature Wolfhound Puppy
description: A small, loyal hunting dog breed, great for companionship and tracking.

name: Feathered Serpent Hatchling

name: Healing Herb Rabbit

name: Stonehide Tortoise
description: A tortoise with a shell as hard as stone, often used for protection.

name: Elven Blossom Pet Treats

name: Collar of Silent Steps

name: Aquatic Glass Tank

name: Enchanted Feeding Bowl

name: Dried Meat Jerky
description: Salted and dried strips of meat, perfect for long journeys.

name: Hardtack Biscuits

name: Herbal Tea Blend
description: A soothing mix of dried herbs from temperate climates.

name: Traveler’s Cloak
description: A durable, weather-resistant cloak suitable for all seasons.

name: Healing Salve
description: A herbal ointment that accelerates minor wound healing.

name: Everburning Lantern

name: Herbal Antivenom
